name: xprocspec
tagline: A tool for testing XProc scripts
body:
xprocspec - XProc testing tool
==============================

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/josteinaj/xprocspec.png?branch=dev)](https://travis-ci.org/josteinaj/xprocspec)

This is an experimental tool for testing XProc scripts. Its syntax is based on [XSpec](https://code.google.com/p/xspec/) and is implemented in XProc.

Feel free to have a look at the code and give feedback, but note that it is not yet a complete and 100% working implementation.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
